languages.text: "Трон побери, вот она, западня, в которую угодил Винтерскейл, а теперь и мы — буйнорастущие леса. Растения растут и гибнут с невероятной скоростью, и контролировать перемещения по ним почти невозможно".

"Throne take us! This is the trap Winterscale walked into, and now we're in it too. Rampant forest growth. The plants spring up and wither at an incredible pace that makes keeping track of movement through them all but impossible."
languages.original_text: "Трон побери, вот она, западня, в которую угодил Винтерскейл, а теперь и мы — буйнорастущие леса. Растения растут и гибнут с невероятной скоростью, и контролировать перемещения по ним почти невозможно".

traits.locale_text: "The Throne take it! This is the trap Winterscale got into, and now we're in it too. Runaway forest growth. The plants spring up and wither at an incredible pace that makes keeping track of movement among them all but impossible."

"The Throne take it! This is the trap Winterscale got into, and now we're in it too. Runaway forest growth. The plants spring up and wither at an incredible pace that makes keeping track of movement among them all but impossible."

"Throne take us! This is the trap Winterscale walked into, and now we're in it too. Rampant forest growth. The plants spring up and wither at an incredible pace that makes keeping track of movement through them all but impossible."

"Throne take us! This is the trap Winterscale walked into, and now we're in it too. Rampant forest growth. The plants spring up and wither at an incredible pace that makes keeping track of movement through them all but impossible."

languages.text: “黄金王座在上！温特斯凯尔掉进了这个陷阱，现在我们也掉了进来。这座失控的森林疯狂生长，所有植物都在以难以置信的速度发芽、枯萎。我们根本没办法在这片森林里找到方向。”
languages.original_text: "Throne take us! This is the trap Winterscale walked into, and now we're in it too. Rampant forest growth. The plants spring up and wither at an incredible pace that makes keeping track of movement through them all but impossible."

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上！温特斯凯尔掉进了这个陷阱，现在我们也掉了进来。这座失控的森林疯狂生长，所有植物都在以难以置信的速度发芽、枯萎。我们根本没办法在这片森林里找到方向。”

languages.text: "Beim Thron! Das ist die Falle, in die Winterzunder getappt ist, und nun sind wir auch hineingeraten. Ein zügellos wuchernder Wald. Die Pflanzen wachsen und verkümmern in einem unglaublichem Tempo, das es unmöglich macht, den Weg im Blick zu behalten."
languages.original_text: "Throne take us! This is the trap Winterscale walked into, and now we're in it too. Rampant forest growth. The plants spring up and wither at an incredible pace that makes keeping track of movement through them all but impossible."

traits.locale_text: "Beim Thron! Das ist die Falle, in die Winterzunder getappt ist, und nun sind wir auch hineingeraten. Ein zügellos wuchernder Wald. Die Pflanzen wachsen und verkümmern in einem unglaublichem Tempo, das es unmöglich macht, den Weg im Blick zu behalten."

languages.text: «¡Que el Trono nos lleve! Esta es la trampa en la que cayó Winterscale, y ahora nosotros hemos caído igual. Crecimiento vegetal descontrolado. Las plantas germinan y se marchitan a una velocidad tan pasmosa que resulta casi imposible orientarse en el bosque».
languages.original_text: "Throne take us! This is the trap Winterscale walked into, and now we're in it too. Rampant forest growth. The plants spring up and wither at an incredible pace that makes keeping track of movement through them all but impossible."

traits.locale_text: «¡Que el Trono me lleve! Esta es la trampa en la que cayó Winterscale, y ahora nosotros hemos caído igual. Crecimiento vegetal descontrolado. Las plantas germinan y se marchitan a una velocidad tan pasmosa que resulta casi imposible orientarse en el bosque».

languages.text: « Par le Trône ! Winterscale est tombé dans ce piège, et voilà que c'est notre tour. Cette forêt évolue à une vitesse ahurissante. Les plantes poussent puis fanent si vite qu'il est impossible de suivre une piste parmi elles. »
languages.original_text: "Throne take us! This is the trap Winterscale walked into, and now we're in it too. Rampant forest growth. The plants spring up and wither at an incredible pace that makes keeping track of movement through them all but impossible."

traits.locale_text: « Par le Trône ! Winterscale est tombé dans ce piège, et voilà que c'est notre tour. Cette forêt évolue à une vitesse ahurissante. Les plantes poussent puis fanent si vite qu'il est impossible de suivre une piste parmi elles. »

languages.text: 「王座よ！これはウィンタースケールが陥った罠だ。そして今、俺たちもその罠に陥っている。暴走する森の成長。木々がその動向を把握することが不可能なほどの驚異的なスピードで生え、枯れていく」
languages.original_text: "Throne take us! This is the trap Winterscale walked into, and now we're in it too. Rampant forest growth. The plants spring up and wither at an incredible pace that makes keeping track of movement through them all but impossible."

traits.locale_text: 「王座よ！これはウィンタースケールが陥った罠だ。そして今、俺たちもその罠に陥っている。暴走する森の成長。木々がその動向を把握することが不可能なほどの驚異的なスピードで生え、枯れていく」

languages.text: "Taht belamızı verdi! Winterscale'in düştüğü tuzak bu işte. Şimdi de biz düştük. Hiddetli bir orman büyümesi... Bitkiler, inanılmaz bir hızda canlanıp soluyor. Bu da hareketlerini takip etmeyi imkânsız kılıyor."
languages.original_text: "Throne take us! This is the trap Winterscale walked into, and now we're in it too. Rampant forest growth. The plants spring up and wither at an incredible pace that makes keeping track of movement through them all but impossible."
